General.Name: Mobile Streams Plc
General.Description: Mobile Streams Plc, together with its subsidiaries, sells digital content for distribution on mobile devices in Europe, Asia, North America, and Latin America. It also provides data insight and intelligence platforms and services. Mobile Streams Plc was incorporated in 1999 and is based in London, the United Kingdom.
General.Address: 125 Wood Street, London, United Kingdom, EC2V 7AW

4.Name: Mr. Simon D. Buckingham
4.Title: Founder & Non-Board VP of Bus. Operations
